程序包 controller

类 GalleryWindowController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.GalleryWindowController
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.util.EventListener
    public class GalleryWindowController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener
    Controller class of GalleryWindow, acts as an intermediary between view and model defines what should happen on user interaction
    作者:
    Chang Chen

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器 说明
      GalleryWindowController​(GalleryWindow view, Recipes model)
      Constructor to create controller object

    • 构造器详细资料

      • GalleryWindowController

        public GalleryWindowController​(GalleryWindow view,
                               Recipes model)
        Constructor to create controller object
        参数:
        view - view object of calculator which is managed by this controller
        model - model object of calculator which is managed by this controller
